text: exercise to listen to the text note the
markings for the thought groups when you
are finished listening go back and read
the text aloud pausing after each
thought group footsteps when I was a boy
I leaped over fences dashed through
fields climb tall trees stomped on ants
and kicked footballs high in the sky
when I was a girl I skipped down paths
danced in my bedroom spun in circles
under the sky jumped rope with my
friends and squatted to smell flowers in
my mother's garden when I was a young
man I hopped into my father's car swayed
with my girl on the dance floor and
stood next to my friend in a fight when
I was a young woman I stepped into
high-heeled shoes turned to look at shop
windows and tiptoed into the house late
on a school night when I became a man I
fell at the feet of a beautiful woman
when I became a woman
I ran blissfully into marriage when I
was a father I knelt to see eye-to-eye
with my child when I was a mother I
tripped over toys on the floor and
rocked my children in my arms now that I
am a grandfather i hobbled to my grand
child's bedside and gaze at her face now
that I'm a grandmother I tapped my feet
as I wait for my grandchildren to visit
me
when we reminisce with stroll arm and
arm how far our feet have taken us
footsteps was originally written as a
text to help students activate English
verbs of motion each motion is performed
by our legs or feet do you know these
verbs from the text climb dance - fall
hobble hop jump kick
kneel leap rock run skip spin squat
stand step stomp stroll sway tap tiptoe
drip turn
that's all for now thanks for watching
and happy studies
